text: @SouthwestAir yeah haha. Never been in one. It's expensive 😂😂 and we will!!!!! So much fun! #destinationdragons

@united Mobile boarding pass disappeared from phone while standing in line to board. Second time this week... Hmm.
@USAirways how about a drink voucher for the next flight?? #winkwink

@united 
I will admit, you've been rather good to me over the years.
You've still got me hooked.

Peace.

@united appreciate it, but changing time by 10 min multiple times 6 hours before flight is just annoying and seems like you have 0 clue
@AmericanAir He thanks you. Anything you can do to help. Would any further information help in the process?
@USAirways I have fam thats supposed to fly 2/22 that are currently in the hosp.3 trys to speak to a human, yr phone sys cuts off. pls hlp!

@USAirways care to elaborate on why CHA to DCA is Cancelled Flightled this evening?
@USAirways thanks for nothing. Bought two tix through you to Disney and my friend can't go and now I have to eat the 400, plus 600 for new 1
@united flight to RSW tonight -me &  twin 3 year olds. A pilot who was in row by me stayed to help me get the boys & bags off. Lifesaver!!
@USAirways no warm weather hubs means no Mexico for us.  And I can't go anywhere else since you lost my bags. I hope you attempt to rectify
@united Apparently they are asking 20 people to off board the plane--how can such a big miscalculation be made?!
@USAirways @AmericanAir now this is beyond ridiculous. Some steering problem delays us again. #neveragain  it's no wonder you had to sell
@AmericanAir I've been trying to reach your customer service for TWO days. I have received zero response. Never traveling AA again.

@SouthwestAir hello #SouthwestAir I'm  happy to be flying with you this morning DAL-MDW #4053 looking forward to a comfortable fight

@AmericanAir LTALJX, from DCA to OMA this morning. All of the staff that helped me fix my problem were so helpful. #goodthingscome #thanks
@united the upgrade to first class was a nice way to fix your earlier mistake. Thank you!
@united thanx so much. You followed through and emailed me a $1000 ticket voucher. #unitedairlines they do care
@united the least you could do is offer me a ticket in coach instead of just Cancelled Flighting my reservation because of your glitch!!! #notfair
@SouthwestAir just sent another 4 drink coupons....I think I have over 30 coupons now. free drinks anyone?

@united so much for being here to help. Very disappointed in your customer service.

@USAirways Mellani B. and whole team in Columbia SC are absolute superstars. Incredibly helpful.
@JetBlue thanks! Yes! order me a rum and coke and get me a hotel voucher because the floor and chairs aren't so cushy here...!

@Usairways thanks for making miss connection, getting rebooked, missing that too, and a miserable day. Started my day @ 4:30am for nothing!
